author.name: ★Michelle S Hawkins, BA, JD★Michelle S Hawkins, BA, JD
author.title: CEO at AmazonTC LLCCEO at AmazonTC LLC

content: What’s the biggest lie being told about AI?Let’s talk about it 👀The biggest lie people believe about AI art + automation?That it’s cold, robotic, and impersonal.The truth?When done right — with intention, creativity, and the right systems — AI and automation can actually make your business feel more human, not less.AI isn’t soulless. It’s just been in the wrong hands.✨ AI art gives your brand soul.⚙️ Automation gives you time to actually connect.I don’t replace your magic — I amplify it.If you’ve been side-eyeing tech because it feels too masculine, too complicated, or too impersonal… sis, I build it differently. I build it for us.Because you deserve systems that feel like self-care — and visuals that reflect your full brilliance.If you’ve ever avoided automation or AI because it felt cold or overwhelming, drop a 💻 below. Let’s reframe that, together.hashtag#TechWithHearthashtag#FeminineSystemshashtag#AIArtThatConnectshashtag#WomenInAutomationhashtag#30DaysOfVisibility
